Package au.edu.apsr.mtk.ch

Interface Summary
METSHandler Interface which any METS Content Handler must implement
 

Class Summary
DefaultMETSHandler The default METS SAX Handler.
ExternalContentMETSHandler A METS SAX handler for use where it is known FContent is not used.
METSReader A METS Reader which takes a METS input stream and maps it to a DOM Document
